name: La Jolla Country Day School
description: La Jolla Country Day School (LJCDS) is an independent, college preparatory day school in San Diego, California, serving students age 3 to Grade 12. LJCDSs mission is to prepare students for a lifetime of intellectual exploration, personal growth and social responsibility. LJCDS is committed to inspiring greatness for a better world by fostering a culture and a community that leads with dignity.  Some of the features include:  *NOTIFICATIONS - Get instant updates and important announcements *CALENDAR - See whats happening at LJCDS and add events directly to your phones calendar *DIRECTORY - Easily find the information you need and add contacts to your phone *ATHLETICS - Show your school spirit and check the latest scores and schedules *PORTAL - Easy access to the My LJCDS portal  And more!
